title: Scotland Green and Independent (with David Linden MP)
itunes:title: Scotland Green and Independent (with David Linden MP)
description:
David Linden, SNP MP for Glasgow East, describes how Scottish independence and taking the lead on climate change go hand in hand for Scottish Nationalists. He also discusses the concerns around a COP26 Covid surge with Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts.

Plus the Brexit rows over fishing and the Northern Ireland protocol. Bloomberg's Joe Mayes, who attended the G20 summit, describes the tense moments between Boris Johnson and Emmanuel Macron.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
